amendment.description: An amendment numbered 149 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to decrease Section 8104, Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative bye Initiative by $300,000,000, and increase the Spending Reduction Account by $300,000,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative by $300,000,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 330 (Roll no. 432).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 330 (Roll no. 432).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
